scripts.build-live: ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm-live elm/Main.elm --dir=www --pushstate --ssl -- --output=www/elm-gui.js
scripts.build-live-insecure: ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm-live elm/Main.elm --dir=www --pushstate -- --output=www/elm-gui.js
scripts.debug-live-insecure: ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --debug --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm && ./node_modules/.bin/elm-live elm/Main.elm --dir=www --pushstate -- --output=www/elm-gui.js --debug
scripts.build-win: powershell node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm
scripts.build-live-win: powershell node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm-live.cmd elm/Main.elm --dir=www --pushstate --ssl -- --output=www/elm-gui.js
scripts.build-live-insecure-win: powershell node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-gui.js elm/Main.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-browserless.js elm/Browserless.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm.cmd make --output=www/elm-headless.js elm/Headless.elm ; node_modules/.bin/elm-live.cmd elm/Main.elm --dir=www --pushstate -- --output=www/elm-gui.js
